data.description_html:
This spell functions like lesser truename binding, except that you can call a single creature of CR 10 or less.
XP Cost: 200 XP.
data.name: Truename Binding
data.spell_range: Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels); see lesser planar binding text
data.spell_resistance: No and yes; see lesser planar binding text
data.target: One elemental or outsider of CR 10 or less
